column1: 6. Hot Dog Server (My Favorite Figure Form This Series)

This is without a doubt the greatest CMF of 2017 in my opinion everything about this figure is useful. He has a new tray mold that can hold a hot dog and new plain unprinted squishy cup. His hat is great for a waiter/waitress army so is the rest of the figure. His face print is a young face and can be used for a child or teen which i love. He gets a well deserved 100%

column1: This series is a alright series but comparing it to the Batman and Ninjago movie series it is a lot weaker thanks to 4-6 awful figures but there are two stand out figures that are great and they are Hot Dog Server and Pastry Chief.

column2: Great accessories throughout the series and awesome new mold in selected figures.
